idea: Manastu Space started by IIT Bombay alumni in 2017 with a dream, one day every problem on the earth will be solved using space directly, indirectly or by spin-offs. We have a dream, every last person on the earth has access to world-class education and health care. No one should die because of lack of information. Space might just be the way to realize this dream. This is not possible without low cost and sustainable access to space. So we develop the technologies to achieve this dream.
name: MANASTU SPACE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
PN Safety Industries


PN SAFETY INDUSTRIES based in Mumbai, which has been in the business of Construction Safety, Industrial & Fire Safety, Marine Safety & Agricultural Safety.  Please find below our range of services in the same industry sector we caters nationwide..

Specialized Manufacturer 

Construction Safety Nets, Industrial Safety Nets, Cargo Nets, Scramble Nets, Wooden Rope Ladder, Pilot Ladder, Aluminum Rope Ladder, Rope Lifting slings

Largest Stockiest 
  • Ropes - P.P. Rope, HDPE Rope, Polyamide Rope, Karnmantle Rope etc
  • Nets - Mono filament Shade Net, Agro Shade Net, Fishnet, Anti Bird Nets etc
  • Fall Protection Equipment - Safety Belts / Full body harnesses, Fall arrester, Descender, Facade Cleaning Kit etc.
  • Personal Safety Equipment - Safety Helmet, Safety Shoes, Safety Jacket, Safety Gloves , Eye wear, Ear plugs, Nose masks
  • Material Handling Equipment - Polyster lifting sling, Wire rope sling, PP rope sling, Ratchet Lashing belt etc.
  • FIRE Safety Equipment - All type of extinguishers, Fire bucket, Fire Blanket, Fire Hose 
  • Road Safety Equipment - Speed Breakers, Safety Cone, Spring Post, Road Barricades, Barricade Net , Danger Tape
  • First Aid Medico Equipment - First aid box, Stretcher etc.
name: PN Safety Industries
